pipeline.purpose: To obtain a general overview of AI, its history, and foundational concepts.
To fetch and summarize the latest research papers on AI, providing cutting-edge insights and developments in the field.
To gather recent news articles that discuss the current state, applications, and impact of AI in various sectors.
To synthesize the gathered information into a detailed, structured, and understandable explanation of AI.
pipeline.input: Explain about ai, incorporating the summaries from Wikipedia, Arxiv, and recent news articles.

plan.reasoning: To provide a comprehensive explanation of AI, it is beneficial to gather information from a general encyclopedia, academic papers, and recent news articles. Wikipedia will give a broad overview, while Arxiv will provide the latest research insights. News articles can offer current applications and societal impacts of AI. Finally, the QA engine will synthesize this information into a detailed and coherent explanation.
